website_summaries.verdict: The well-built 8-inch LG G Pad is a good smaller Android tablet, but it doesn't do anything to stand out from the crowded pack. Especially given its high $350 price.

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet but bad seller
customer_reviews.text: This tablet was fantastic as far as specs go. Then the front screen started popping off. I figured the screen previously broke and was poorly replaced. Wasnt even 5 minutes and I had to sadly pull the trigger for a return. Otherwise this beast is fast. Worth it if the seller had done the replacement for the screen correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Ldabreau

customer_reviews.title: 4 which is also a very good tablet but with {for me anyway} some idiosyncrasies in ...
customer_reviews.text: Selected after trying the Samsung Tab Pro 8.4 which is also a very good tablet but with {for me anyway} some idiosyncrasies in touch controls making it a deal breaker. G Pad was bought refurbished. Have not has one problem so far. Decent battery life, excellent HD screen, beautifully balanced, natural appearing colors. fast processor running the latest android operating system, and quality build. Overall, a very appealing product. Would buy again in a heartbeat and highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tablet
customer_reviews.text: This tablet is incredible! I had a Samsung S tablet before this tablet. The LG G pad rocks and is way better than the Samsung. It's fast, has incredible graphics, and a pretty decent battery life. I love, love, love this tablet and can't think of a single con regarding it.
customer_reviews.author: Punkin1974

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tablet, with lots of extras.
customer_reviews.text: The LG G Pad is pretty awesome! It feels good in the hand, you can easily carry it in your hand. Nice slim design and metal backing. I like the idea that you can stick a memory card in it for extra storage, not many tablets do. The only complaints I have is that sometimes if you lay it down to hard or bump it, it'll say that the memory card is removed. And the other is that this device has limited accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: I bought this in April 2014 and it had some ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in April 2014 and it had some problems so I sent it to LG to see if they can fix it but found that it has no IMEI number and that it is an imitation from china .So please be careful when you buy it from amazon make sure you get the IMEI number
customer_reviews.author: Aniqa

customer_reviews.title: this is the bang for the buck tablet. I ...
customer_reviews.text: this is the bang for the buck tablet. I bought a refurbished, and it is fast ,stable, simple. the only gripe is the screen isn't perfectly even toned. I never use the camera, if that's something that's important to you, it will really let you down.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Friedlein

customer_reviews.title: battery started to crap out after a couple months
customer_reviews.text: was a refurb. battery started to crap out after a couple months. still works a little, maybe an hour or two little pricey for a turd
customer_reviews.author: J. Merker

customer_reviews.title: Hands Down Better than Samsung
customer_reviews.text: So much better than the Samsung, with the exception of perhaps photography users. As a tablet, every feature is better as I have both this one and a Samsung Tab 4 8 inch.
customer_reviews.author: Terrance Mendez

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tablet
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with LG's product. Beautiful colours, big screen compared to nexus 7, snappy, it's already upgraded to kit kat, nice materials, wife is really happy with gift! Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet
customer_reviews.text: This tablet exceeded my expectations. Great size, very fast at processing commands, it has a gorgeous display. Super sharp,screen color and brightness are excellent. Dual speakers are quite loud. At last,but not at least,price is awesome.I really happy and recommend LG G Pad 8.3 tablet to all my friends. P.S. I received tablet with upgrated software android the 4.4.2 (Kit Kat)
customer_reviews.author: bnrd 01/06/2013

customer_reviews.title: I just love LG devices
customer_reviews.text: Everything is just fine about this G pad from size to looks to quality, however performance could be better with faster processor but I know i did pay very reasonable price. I always recommend LG mobile phones and pads because they are really great products and reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: Yahia

customer_reviews.title: Had a life of its own
customer_reviews.text: It worked fine for about a week and than all of a sudden it decided to have its own life. It began to type gibrish all by itself and some parts of the screen were not responding anymore. After a factory reset the slate worked fine gain for a day, but that was all. So i had to send it back. I had my money refunded very soon after Amazon received it, so i am very happy with their service
customer_reviews.author: jack kuyper

customer_reviews.title: Happy so far
customer_reviews.text: A good tablet with decent specs, I would recommend it to friends and family, would receive 4 stars if it is upgraded to lollipop, fast and reliable, with good dev support, Only other downside is that the gamma makes some movies seem to dark. Overall a good budget buy.
customer_reviews.author: DYounkin

customer_reviews.title: I love this tab
customer_reviews.text: I love this tab! It is slim and has a beautiful display. It is really responsive and holds a charge for a long time. No complaints
customer_reviews.author: Britany Harper

customer_reviews.title: I am satisfied so far....
customer_reviews.text: So far so Good,have had it for 2 days....no complaints. Its as it was described. Moves fast, the screen is easy on the eyes. Not too bright nor dim, just right. but easy to adjust from the drop down screen. The LG G pad has a lot to offer.
customer_reviews.author: Alva

customer_reviews.title: but its a great quality product and design - thumbs
customer_reviews.text: its an android so the advantages and disavantages comes with it... but its a great quality product and design - thumbs up
customer_reviews.author: Romane

customer_reviews.title: Like this pad.
customer_reviews.text: The only gripe I have is hitting the home button in landscape mode. Thin bezel, other than that great pad. Just wish roocase made a case for it.
customer_reviews.author: grumpy inspector

customer_reviews.title: Great deal.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome tablet. Condition was great for being used. Battery life is not the best but I love the size.
customer_reviews.author: R. Ponce

customer_reviews.title: Liking the g-pad
customer_reviews.text: Solid light weight LG device with great screen resolution, battery life is OK, not exceptional and not expecting it to last 10hours.
customer_reviews.author: Guido Theunissen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good! Each screen go well perfectly and touch is always good.
customer_reviews.author: YOUNGLAI KIM

customer_reviews.title: Love this tablet
customer_reviews.text: Love this tablet. It offers so much more than my old Ipad. Wish it was a little bigger, but I love it! Great Purchase...
customer_reviews.author: Jupiter girl

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tablet, great price.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this great little tablet refurbished from one of the links above. It was a great price. The product arrived in like new condition. I am very happy with my purchase. The 8.3 size of this tablet is perfect for your hand. My g/f has a galaxy 7, which always seemed a little too small. After having tried a surface Rt, I'm glad I sold it to buy this. The apps and performance are so much better than the surface. No need to get the more expensive google play edition. Just install a launcher from the app store and it rocks. The price/value is hard to beat.
customer_reviews.author: D. Melanson

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: I love this tablet. It is the perfect size, fast, easy to use, it has never crashed on me. LG is making a very good product. I am now an LG fan.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: I Like it so far
customer_reviews.text: Playing with it about 3 days so far so good, nothing major flaws seen Good Screen Size, High Display, Pixel DPI is good, excellent buy if you want to save some money on 8 inch tablet. Battery drains quickly , watching video's will last for 5 hours , for reading it would last 6-7 hrs. If daily charge is not a problem then consider it.
customer_reviews.author: satish kumar budati

customer_reviews.title: Love the size
customer_reviews.text: First tablet. Love the size, weight and clarity of the screen . Have not used my bulky laptop since receiving this. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: nancy kaye

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: After some time it is great tablet. Generally I adore LG products!!!
customer_reviews.author: Milan S.

customer_reviews.title: I cannot put this little toy away--I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Now that I have received the lightweight case, as noted above, I cannot put this little toy away--I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Merci

customer_reviews.title: Great Tablet for the price!
customer_reviews.text: It's to bad LG has a locked bootloader, although I use Loki to bypass it, great device, running Slim Rom on it and its very fast.
customer_reviews.author: Solo

customer_reviews.title: best tablet ive ever had
customer_reviews.text: I'm having a really good experience with this tablet. It's fast, responsive and light. The screen is perfect size, 7 inche's is too small.
customer_reviews.author: Andrey

customer_reviews.title: The best I have tried!
customer_reviews.text: The fastest and the most intuitive tablet I have tried. When you have other LG products....you home comes alive anywhere you are in connection of what you want to do.
customer_reviews.author: Moonshine

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet and perfect size
customer_reviews.text: This tablet is a sweet spot in size. I have used both 10 and 7 inch tablets and this one is a perfect mix of usable screen and portability. The G Pad is well made and runs smoothly everything I throw at it. LG customization of Kit Kat is not too invasive, and some goodies like Qslide are actually very useful (I love multitasking). Something that lacks is a wide array of cases. You can find some, but not many, and none that I know officially provided by LG.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: A GREAT MULTITASKING TABLET~
customer_reviews.text: A FANTASTIC TAB WITH A KILLER SCREEN... IT'S ALSO A UNIVERSAL REMOTE!
customer_reviews.author: Tbone

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality... Started with the Galaxy 4 but it was just like my phone this is a bit bigger and does everything as the Galaxy if not more. Very Happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: This issue is even worse when I try to change the tablet settings cause ...
customer_reviews.text: Apps close randomly. This issue get's worse when I try to change the tablet settings. Every time I go to settings, it closes after a few seconds. This is annoying.
customer_reviews.author: PandaMaki

customer_reviews.title: Quality is good. Sound output is very good
customer_reviews.text: Quality is good. Sound output is very good. Totally worth for the money. Cons: UI look & feel is not good. Apps icons are odd. Not attractive look like old model. LG need more concentrate on ui. Otherwise its a compatative tablet for samsung
customer_reviews.author: Prabu

customer_reviews.title: great tablet
customer_reviews.text: Love the size and performance. Battery could be better but overall a great product
customer_reviews.author: Joe P

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This exactly what I expected and it looks as described
customer_reviews.author: James C. Jones Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for students
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing tablet it has not failed me yet. I have been using my LG Gpad for over a month now an the only thing I can complain about is the amount of ram. It still functions powerfully but once in a while experiences a bit of lag but it dose not impede on my tasks. Simple and functional for nearly any user.
customer_reviews.author: schuyler morgan

customer_reviews.title: Older tech, still worth it for $150.
customer_reviews.text: As expected. Very nice display. Reasonably quick for two-year old tech. Battery life could be better, but that's true of most products. The wifi seemed a little slow, but again, it's two year old tech.
customer_reviews.author: jeff hoover

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I got mine refurbished, but it looked brand new. No scratches, no signs of use, it was in amazing condition. The screen is gorgeous, it's the perfect size for my hands, and it runs beautifully - super smooth & responsive. On par, if not better, than my boyfriend's Nexus 7. My one caveat: I'm not a fan of LG's software, but it was super easy to root & install a custom ROM on.
customer_reviews.author: Kyrie Tompkins-Overlock

customer_reviews.title: I think the camera could be a little better but other than that
customer_reviews.text: I think the camera could be a little better but other than that, I love it!! really convenient for a college student to use!!
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Lyons

customer_reviews.title: great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: picked it up for 179 last year. great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Dakshesh Patel

customer_reviews.title: seems like a good mach
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for the kid he likes I most of time. He jacked it up so who knows why he complains
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Bought mine used here on Amazon from NewTechPros ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Bought mine used here on Amazon from NewTechPros for $170 and it came in 2 days. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Watkins

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's a good tablet built tougher than most others, which was important as it was bought for a tween
customer_reviews.author: Yoda

customer_reviews.title: Premium tablet
customer_reviews.text: I also have a Nexus 7 (gen 2) tablet, and this LG tablet is much nicer. It wakes up with a double tap, on the Nexus I always have to look for the power button. It also plays videos better than the Nexus 7, there are videos that play with occasional distortion on the Nexus but play perfectly on the LG tablet. Although more expensive than the Nexus 7, it never reboots, and it keeps it charge better in sleep mode. About the only minor negatives are that it is a little bigger than the Nexus 7 so it doesn't fit as well in a jacket pocket, and the back is slick rather than non-slip.
customer_reviews.author: R. Chung

customer_reviews.title: Im pleased by my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Im pleased by my purchase. Its refurbished but it looks brand new, no dents or scratches. No problems found so far.
customer_reviews.author: Kylie L

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: I adore this tablet. I use it EVERY SINGLE DAY!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Howard

customer_reviews.title: He Love's Me!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My Nephew is graduating from college and I am so PROUD of him so I got him a Tablet and He love's it! He will love me forever!
customer_reviews.author: Jazzy60!!!

customer_reviews.title: I love it had some issues at first
customer_reviews.text: I love it had some issues at first ...but I let it sit a couple days n all of a sudden everything was working perfectly I can't put it down
customer_reviews.author: Traci

customer_reviews.title: Did love this tablet until....
customer_reviews.text: I am so upset that I purchased this tablet some time ago and now having issues with the tablet. I contact LG support and they cannot help me because this product turned out to be an international tablet and only have serial number and no imei number. Now no one can help me with my problems of being stuck in a boot loop since a firmware upgrade on 10/16/2015. I am so pissed.
customer_reviews.author: Unique

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The battery doesn't last long enough. Compare to Apple iPad, this one is not competitive. Cheap quality.
customer_reviews.author: X. Lin

customer_reviews.title: Nice but could be nicer.
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking tablet but not as fast as you would expect with quad core processor. Screen is very sensitive. Too often while scrolling I accidentley open a page. Another feature I mlss from my Asus tablet is the word choices shown while you are typing. That feature is handier than spell check. I do like the 8 inch screen.
customer_reviews.author: inazsully

customer_reviews.title: Love the tablet
customer_reviews.text: Love the tablet! Great for movies which is what I truly bought it for while traveling. 2 small cons: wish the volume could be louder (white noise ear buds help) and the screen not reflect as much. Low stars for seller. The item was not shrink wrapped and you can't return electronics to amazon if they aren't. Would have been mad if I found this item cheaper elsewhere while waiting for it to arrive.
customer_reviews.author: bingocuse

customer_reviews.title: Not great. Prefer my samsung
customer_reviews.text: Meh. Price was right, does what it does. Not great. Prefer my samsung.
customer_reviews.author: Skippy M

customer_reviews.title: It doesnt even update android it still uses android 4 ...
customer_reviews.text: It doesnt even update android it still uses android 4 not kitkat (the white version)
customer_reviews.author: Ter_on

customer_reviews.title: No Complaints
customer_reviews.text: Using it right now. No complaints. Bought a keyboard and stand...works very well with them. Porn is easy to watch with a stand so make sure you get one with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: nic

customer_reviews.title: LG: Locked Down for Your Safety
customer_reviews.text: When I buy a computer, I expect to be able to do whatever I want with it. LG obviously disagrees because, no matter what I tried, I couldn't get root on this thing... So back it went.
customer_reviews.author: Sosumido

customer_reviews.title: When I got this, it was refurbished. I ...
customer_reviews.text: When I got this, it was refurbished. I had ordered new... nowhere did it say on the page when I ordered that this was refurbished. Also I had ordered the case for it. This tablet was NO WAY an 8.3 tablet. It was much larger than the case, much larger than screen protectors. Completely now what I ordered. I did send it back. Hopefully it will be taken care of with no issues. Other than that... it got here very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Frosty Lilacs

customer_reviews.title: Good product but flawed
customer_reviews.text: The product is excellent, but failure came with 2 white dots on the screen, I'm disappointed. Since I sent to another country and it seems impossible to return!
customer_reviews.author: Alejandra Gallardo

customer_reviews.title: Like it. Good
customer_reviews.text: Good tablet. Good color and cool display. Suitable size for me.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond

product_meta.title: LG G Pad 8.3 Tablet Quad-core 2gb RAM 16gb Flash 8.3 Full Hd Display White
product_meta.description: With an 8.3 WUXGA high-definition IPS touch-screen display supporting 1920 x 1200 resolution, this LG G Pad 8.3 LGV500.AUSAWH tablet offers simple navigation and sharp visual detail. QSlide and Slide Aside ensure efficient multitasking capabilities.
feature_bullets: This refurbished product is tested and certified to look and work like new. The refurbishing process includes functionality testing, basic cleaning, inspection, and repackaging. The product ships with all relevant accessories, and may arrive in a generic box

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars124 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
